subject: Re: Thank you for your recent refinance application, we are accepting your loan request
body:
Your credit score does not matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE money to spend ANY way you like, or simply require to LOWER your monthly payments by a third or more, here is the deal we can offer you NOW (hurry, this lot will expire TONIGHT):
$437,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest current payments!
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill this easy form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit score will not disqualify you!
http://storeapsagain.com/
